songs.lyrics:
Hard bony limbs covered in leathered skin
Behind his eyes with the rage of ten warped men
Without a sound he steals right through the night
The sign of death to him brings grim delight

Those marked for death can feel him coming near
Some stand in fight and some just cry in fear
On a horse black, the dark lord takes to flight
But no one forgets the Highlander rode tonight

(x2)
Can't you hear his call
The Mightiest will fall
He will control your destiny
Many mortal screams out of agony
The Highlander has come for me

(approx)
We all see him kneel, after the ... ... fathers
Those who died on the field of battle, ... (grunt/shout)
Yes slay 500 noble men and did not need to many, no (NO!)
(approx)

There's no white spell to best this Earth Pig born
Against his kind an eternal oath was sworn
All kinds of men will fall beneath his blade
Women and children, the choice it has been made

You see him fighting across the field
Some Stand and fight and some just cry in fear
On a horse black, the dark lord takes to flight
But no one forgets the Highlander rode tonight

And the bodies of the Sesair spread across the barren plains
And my heart did rise to celebrate as I pulled upon the reigns
Then I heard the sound of flutes and drums through the twisted tangled trees
So I drove the deer-skin chariot and the thickets covered me

Where is the road to lead me home?
For my eyes and arms a weary and I wear a crown of thorns
When will I claim my rightful crown
For the forst sky is bleary and my horses hooves are ground

So we rode into the clearing as the moon rose full and bright
And before us stood a statue made of branched found up tight
All around it danced the witches of the Horned One in a rage
Setting fire to the rogues imprisoned in a bracken cage

Who will come to set the prisoners free
For their fate looks dark and dreary and they're infidels like me
Then a flash came from the clearing open up before my eyes
Painted shaman and his acolytes rode in and gave the sign
Highest Drunelord of the Horned One she'd his antlers his skin
With a waving of his arms I joined the rogues to burn within

Soon I will break us out of this cage
Or the fire will consume us, we'll be back and in a rage

Down and out on the Solomani Rim
Now the spinward marches don't look so grim

I hear the X-boats on my trail
Engines always on the run

I'm mercenary, live in hyper-drive
Traders and Gunboats keeping me alive

On route to Pscias always on the run
Busted in the Sword-Worlds with a loaded Gauss-Gun

I hear the X-boats on my trail
Engines always on the run

(approx)
The Sword-Worlds are a loose confederation of worlds
all colonised in the same era

Through the centuries their relationship has varied from 
fledgeling empires to scattered trading packs

At the spinward edge 120 parsecs
from the original center of the Empirium

The Martians represent one of the furthest
extensive exploration in the Zodani consulate and Vargr extents
(approx)

Down and out on the Solomani Rim
Now the spinward marches don't look so grim

On route to Pscias always on the run
Busted in the Sword-Worlds with a loaded Gauss-Gun (Gauss-Gun)

I hear the X-boats on my trail
Engines always on the run

Released from the bondage
Bloodlust is turned to knowledge
I will kill you
Return into the carnage

Sentient forms have risen
Time is an endless prison
You will die
I'll become cold and wizened

You know your place in history
Are you denying I am free?
Any prophet of this new dark age can see

Rise from the tomb of millions
Crawl to become reptilian
I will kill you

Like those who came before you
Life never ceased to bore you
You will die
History will ignore you

Then you'll engage in sophistry
Why can't you handle being free?
Another victim of a slaughter prophecy

You know your place in history
Are you denying I am free?
Any prophet of this new dark age can see

No need for ritual slaughter
Bow to the crest of martyrs
You will evolve
But not getting any smarter

You think the truth will set you free
While you're denying what you see
Any prophet of this new dark age can see
songs.songName: I Will Kill You/You Will Die

songs.lyrics:
Decending and turning the shadowed souls in his hand
Standing alone by the guadrian I hear his command
Swaying blindly, under a moribund sun
Strangely the pain has only begun

Painlessly crossing the yardlines the ball in his hand
Piles of bodies dispached in the grass and the sand
Helmets crashing, under the weight of the one
Vaguely aware the pain has begun

Out of the window the sirens of slaughter begin
Whistling alone in the silence I hear them come in
Fading blinded, foraging under the leaves
Strangely the pain is finally relieved

Twelve heards on the mainland shore
Gathering slaughter I wait
I'll bring you my finest (paw?)
Driving the drones to their fate
I'm a swineherd awaiting my masters
Return from the city of (try?)

The anger of gods increase
Slaughering cattle to burn
The baiting of hounds won't ciece
Long for their master they yearn
?Soon as we'll fall to the hand of my master upon his triumphant return?

The ?insulence? soon disposed
Carelessly stalking their prey
I'm ?raging? the islands coast
Searching my mind far away

I'm a swineherd impatiently waiting
To spill your blood on the day

The spheres in motion
Wrapped around collapsing star
Immortal hands and eyes a frame
On fearful scars

The mistery of living,
Breating dying hard
My name and occupation
Tattoed on my face

The stars my destiny deep space my dwelling place

You should have seen him
Lying alone in helpless silence in the night
You should have seen him
You would have seen his eye reflecting in the light

So for the old man
Ashes to ashes, earth to earth and dust to dust
No one will see me
No one with guilt to share, no secret soul to trust

And he won't be found at all
Not a trace to mark his fall
Nor a stain upon the wall

Louder and louder
Till I could tell the sound was not within my ears
And you should have seen me
You would have seen my eyes grow wide and cold with fear

Heard all the things in Heaven and Earth
I've seen many things in Hell
But his vulture's eye of a cold pale blue
It's the eye of the Devil himself

Take me away now
But let the silence drown the beating of his heart
I can't go on
Let me be free from this wretched secret that I carry
Please set me free

I’m scanning Mithril’s Glade
Cosmos a dull crusade
I’m a Bright Face drone
I wondered endlessly
Cosmonic vagrancy
On a two-faced clone

Cascading amongst the stars
Relating through avatars
Invading deserted moores

Transmitting across the planes
Enduring the frozen rain
Cascading amongst the stars

Professor's Guinea Pig
Abandoned mining rig
He’s the last in line
Knife of the Frontier Wars
Free Traders’ merchant whores
It’s his finest crime

Cascading amongst the stars
And hiding behind the scars
Acquired in frontier wars

Straight out of the Neutral Zone
Abandoned the merchant clone
Cascading amongst the stars

Past the mining zone
Mission straight to Rhylan
Seized your weapons on the ground

Vice of Median
Breaks the range of silence
Crossed this space but never found
